


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.string -->

# ```js lowerFirst ```


Lower first letter

## Parameters

- **string**  String: The string to lower the first letter



## Example (js)

```js
import lowerFirst from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/string/lowerFirst'
lowerFirst('Hello world') // hello world
```
